text: The Climate Data Exchange (CDX) is a JPL software framework, built on the Apache Object Oriented Data Technology (OODT) software, for sharing climate data and models. ==References== ==External links== * https://web.archive.org/web/20090803225237/http://cdx.jpl.nasa.gov/ * http://oodt.apache.org Category:Object-oriented programming
title: Climate Data Exchange
